note.p: Hat manufacturer. Resided in Surrey Square, Old Kent Road, London, and also at Aperfield, Cudham, Kent. Supplied CD with information on the flight of carrier pigeons.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/342/121/9)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 June 2017)
England & Wales, Quaker birth, marriage, and death registers, 1578–1837 (Ancestry.com, accessed 2 June 2017)
